# Database Backup Failed

## Database Backup Failure

The scheduled database backup failed.

**Time**: 2026-01-30T02:57:26.023Z
**Workflow run**: https://github.com/zerdos/spike-land-nextjs/actions/runs/21502733124

### Next Steps

1. Check the workflow run logs for specific error details
2. Common causes:

   - R2 storage connectivity issues
